summary: App includes admin-gated content management; user wants an in-app way to update/manage notices and events via an admin page/workflow.
architectural_notes: Admin features are gated by matching the logged-in/profile email to a configured authorized admin email.
known_issues: Admin email update/build attempt failed to implement; admin controls may remain inaccessible until authorization logic is updated.

existing_features.title: Add React Query mutation hooks for updating notices and events, and ensure query invalidation correctly refreshes all notices and both upcoming/past event lists after create/update/delete operations.

Provide an in-app UI to edit existing notices and events from the admin experience. Add an Edit action for each notice/event row that opens a dialog pre-filled with the current values, allows changes, and saves via the update mutations with clear success/error toasts.

new_feature_requests.summary: Provide an admin workflow/page to create, edit, and update notices and events in-app (not just view a permission message).
Support configuring/setting the authorized admin email (e.g., sadashivn.a@gmail.com) so admin features become available after login/profile update.

Add backend update APIs for notices and events so an admin can modify existing records (not only create/delete). Specifically, implement functions to update a Notice by id (category, title, content, date) and update an Event by id (eventType, title, description, date, isPast), enforcing the same designated-admin authorization used by create/delete.

projectName: Add edit/update workflow for notices and events
